name: Foodtruck Fighters
description:
Assemble food whilst under fire in order to get to your food ready for lunch hour!  Select raw ingredients whilst in cover and assemble the recipes in the correct order. A list of recipes can be found on the main menu.

Controls

Shoot / Select and place food - Click 

Space -  Take Cover(HOLD)/ Reload(PRESS) - You can't assemble food whilst in cover! Click plates to add food when a raw ingredient is being held

Success sound - grunz @ https://freesound.org/people/grunz/sounds/109662/, CC Attribution Licence Gunshot eardeer @ https://freesound.org/people/eardeer/sounds/402012/, CC Attribution Licence background track - Fractal Crook by Edward Shallow, Free Music Archive, CC BY SA https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Edward_Shallow/Hippodichotomous/02_Fractal_Crook
